legal_name.description_general: Official registered name used in statutory filings and legal contracts.

brand_names.description_general: Trading or consumer-facing names recognised by customers or regulators.

entity_type.description_general: Legal form determining liability, taxation and reporting duties.

founding_date.description_general: Date of incorporation; used for age benchmarking and anniversary comms.

founders.description_general: Individuals who established the firm; informs origin story and equity.

identifiers.description_general: Cross-database keys enabling deterministic look-ups (CIK, LEI, DUNS, etc.).

website_url.description_general: Canonical website for scraping and backlink analysis.

social_links.description_general: Official social profiles used for sentiment or reach analytics.

logo_url.description_general: Primary brand image asset for UI rendering and CV models.

hq_address.description_general: Legal or main operating address; drives tax and regulatory context.

additional_offices.description_general: List of other significant sites helpful for supply-chain or talent decisions.

markets_served.description_general: Geographic regions in which products or services are sold.

remote_ratio.description_general: Percentage of workforce that is remote/hybrid; impacts facilities and culture.

core_values.description_general: Guiding principles shaping culture and decision filters.

strategic_pillars.description_general: 3-5 focus themes organising investment and prioritisation.

company_okrs.description_general: Current Objectives & Key Results that align teams and measure progress.

balanced_scorecard.description_general: KPIs across Financial, Customer, Internal Process, Learning perspectives.

go_to_market_strategy.description_general: Channels, pricing and positioning to reach and convert customers.

marketing_strategy.description_general: Segmentation, messaging and campaign mix driving demand.

annual_plan.description_general: Top initiatives for the fiscal year with owners and budgets.

quarterly_plan.description_general: Quarter-level milestones guiding cadence and forecasting.

industry_codes.description_general: Standardised codes (NAICS, SIC, GICS) enabling peer benchmarks.

product_lines.description_general: Catalogue of offerings with launch dates and statuses.

flagship_product.description_general: Primary revenue driver; focus for innovation and marketing.

target_segments.description_general: Buyer personas or verticals guiding product-market fit.

top_competitors.description_general: Key rivals for benchmarking and strategic simulation.

employee_count.description_general: Current headcount—baseline for productivity and scale metrics.

leadership_team.description_general: C-suite roster directing strategy and culture.

board_of_directors.description_general: Governance body providing oversight and fiduciary duty.

culture_description.description_general: Narrative of workplace ethos supporting talent decisions.

currency.description_general: Reporting currency for all monetary fields.

gross_profit.description_general: Revenue minus cost of goods sold.

ebitda.description_general: Earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation & amortisation.

cash_flow_operating.description_general: Net cash generated from core operations.

total_assets.description_general: Book value of assets on the balance sheet.

total_liabilities.description_general: Sum of all debts and obligations.

funding_history.description_general: Investment rounds and amounts raised (for private firms).

stock_ticker.description_general: Exchange symbol enabling real-time price pulls.

exchange.description_general: Trading venue with specific disclosure rules.

current_stock_price.description_general: Latest close price for momentum and valuation analysis.

key_ratios.description_general: Health indicators such as ROE and debt-to-equity.

risk_factors.description_general: Material threats summarised from regulatory filings.

regulatory_environment.description_general: Primary regulators and licences influencing compliance.

litigation_summary.description_general: Open legal proceedings affecting risk posture.

certifications.description_general: Standards met (e.g., ISO 27001) impacting vendor decisions.

esg_ratings.description_general: Third-party ESG scores indicating resilience to non-financial risks.

environmental_metrics.description_general: GHG emissions and resource-use data for carbon budgeting.

governance_scores.description_general: Board composition & pay-link metrics used in ESG-G.

sustainability_certifications.description_general: External seals (e.g., B-Corp) validating sustainability performance.

patent_portfolio.description_general: Counts or key patents signalling IP moat.

timeline_events.description_general: Historic milestones that shape narrative and credibility.

upcoming_events.description_general: Future triggers requiring reminders or scenario planning.

strategic_partners.description_general: Alliances or JVs expanding reach and capability.

investor_relations_links.description_general: Authoritative documents for deep RAG pulls.

analyst_ratings.description_general: Sell-side consensus sentiment informing valuation scenarios.

data_source.description_general: Origin of the data for traceability and veracity scoring.

confidence_score.description_general: 0-1 rating used by agents for weighted reasoning.

schema_version.description_general: Versioning field preventing breaking changes across pipelines.
